portfolio IT needs to be able to keep up with this provisioning new resources as development requires it operations also

power and the responsibility of owning their product from planning and design to operations and optimization supported
by tooling and automation they can spend more time focused on improving their users experience rapidly while reducing

rather than doing large quarterly releases doing multiple updates daily is
